DOC.detailed_description: A randomized double-blind control study conduct include 60 patient RA . Patients randomize receive either single intra-articular knee injection triamcinolone hexacetonide 60 mg xylocaine chloride 2 % ( 1 mL ) associate single intramuscular injection 1 mL xylocaine chloride 2 % ( IAI group ) 1 mL xylocaine chloride 2 % intra-articular injection intramuscular injection triamcinolone acetonide 60 mg xylocaine chloride 2 % ( 1 mL ) ( IM group ) . Evaluations perform baseline 1 , 4 , 8 12 week post-intervention .
